item.title: Elon Musk: There's a weird movement to quell free speech around the world. We sh...
item.description:
Elon Musk: There's a weird movement to quell free speech around the world. We should be concerned about that.
‚ÄúWhy was the First Amendment a high priority? Number one is because people came from countries where if you spoke freely, you would be imprisoned or killed. And they were like, we would like to not have that here, because that was terrible.
And actually, there's a lot of places in the world right now, if you're critical of the government, you get imprisoned or killed. We'd like to not have that.‚Äù
Source: All-In Summit, September 9, 2024
